name: Alone in the Forest (Roman E. Gulbrandr)
name_original: Alone in the Forest (Roman E. Gulbrandr)
description:
Welcome to the Forest?

Description:

You are a tiny wolf, named Wolf, who finds himself in the mystery forest full of magic and fairytale characters. You need to help them reveal the secret of your mysterious appearance. Or not?

Peculiarities:

- Mystery forest;

- Fantastic music;

- 4 unique fairytale characters;

- 3 tasks full of magic.

Control:

W,A,S,D - movement

Space - jump

E - actions

Credits:

Game designer - Roman E. Gulbrandr

Music by quebi.newgrounds.com

Sound effects from freesound.org

Assets from unity.assets.com

Thanks to Ann Gry

Created for My First Game Jam: Winter 2022 (in 2 weeks)
